Title: The Deal
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Scott Kosar, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Norma turns to Romero for guidance when she finds herself in an unexpected position of power
